summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FERRE INTI hardware store application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with all major functionality working. Minor issue identified with admin menu visibility logic when multiple users exist.

integration_issues.issue: Admin menu item not visible for non-first users, but this is actually correct behavior since only the first registered user should get admin role
integration_issues.note: This is working as designed - first user gets admin role, subsequent users get customer role

passed_tests: Homepage loads with banner, categories, and products
Admin role assignment (first user becomes admin)
All backend API endpoints (28/28 tests passed)
Admin CRUD operations for products and categories
